column6: With the entire West Coast in peril, who can stop the battle of the Century when Two, count 'em TWO Hulks, get to brawling?  How about everyone's favorite Thunder God -- THE MIGHTY THOR!?  He was out of town during WORLD WAR HULK -- THIS is the match-up you've been DEMANDING!  But can even a God stop the Red Hulk? Find out now!!!
